content: the basic raglan pullover is a quick and simple crochet project perfect for both boys and girls made with easy double_crochet stitches and ***worked seamlessly*** from the ***top down*** ***no sewing*** required it s an ideal pattern for anyone new to top-down raglan yokes and wanting to try one for the first time the pullover ***works up fast*** making it a great choice for ***gifting*** or creating ***cozy handmade sweaters*** for your loved ones available in sizes 2 years to 12 years **sizes** **sizes ** 2 4 6 8 10 12 years **garment chest ** 24 26 28 30 5 32 34 **to fit chest ** 21 23 25 26 5 28 30
